content.name: Stardew Valley Fair
content.set-up: fallFest/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 54 1/changeToTemporaryMap Town-Fair/viewport -1000 -1000/loadActors Set-Up/advancedMove Vincent true -3 0 2 5000 3 0 2 5000/advancedMove Jas true 2 0 4 5000 -2 0 4 5000/advancedMove Marnie true -2 0 4 5000 2 0 2 5000/advancedMove Abigail true 4 6000 5 0 0 3 2 6000 0 -3 -5 0/advancedMove Robin true 0 1 1 5000 0 -2 3 5000 0 1 1 5000/animate Sebastian false true 200 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 17 18 19 20 21 21 21 21 20 22 22 23/addTemporaryActor BabyPig 32 32 65 68 2 false Animal/addTemporaryActor Pig 32 32 65 70 3 false Animal/addTemporaryActor White_Chicken 16 16 59 67 2 false Animal/addTemporaryActor Brown_Chicken 16 16 61 67 2 false Animal/addTemporaryActor White_Cow 32 32 59 72 0 false Animal/addTemporaryActor BabyWhite_Cow 32 32 61 72 1 false Animal/advancedMove BabyPig true 0 1 3 5000 0 -1 0 7000/advancedMove Pig true 3 5000 0 1 1 5000 0 -1 3 5000/advancedMove White_Chicken true 1 0 2 7000 -1 0 2 10000/animate Brown_Chicken false true 500 16 17/viewport 22 22 true unfreeze/globalFadeToClear/pause 2000/playerControl fair
content.Abigail_spouse: I beat all these games last year!$h
content.Leah_spouse: I learned all of Robin's techniques last year, but she's always one step ahead of me!
content.Maru_spouse: mumph... This is my one chance to pig out on barbecue sandwiches.
content.Penny_spouse: I hope we win the grange display contest!
content.Haley_spouse: Did you remember to bring good stuff for our grange display? I hope we win this year.
content.Sebastian_spouse: Hey, @. I'm just catching up with Sam. Go ahead and have some fun.
content.Sam_spouse: Sebastian's the same as always. Are you having fun at the festival?
content.Alex_spouse: I'm just catching up with some old friends... you go on and have a good time.
content.Harvey_spouse: I'll wait here until you're ready to go home...
content.Elliott_spouse: The smokey aroma drew me here, yet 'twas the zesty sauce that truly sealed my fate... *gurgle*$s
content.Abigail: I already beat all the games... now what?
content.Robin: Woodworking is an ancient tradition that I'm very proud to be a part of.$h
content.Demetrius: Robin really works hard on her carpentry stuff... she deserves a little recognition now and then.
content.Maru: *slurp* mmm... this barbecue sauce is amazing.$h
content.Sebastian: It's kinda hectic today... I'm just gonna hang out here for a while.
content.Pierre: My store carries the very finest quality products in the whole valley. Please, inspect my grange display closely and see for yourself!
content.Caroline: Pierre is very serious about his grange display. He's been setting aside the best-looking produce for weeks in preparation.#$e#Hey, best of luck to you if you enter!
content.Linus: These animals never judge people by their looks. The same can't be said for humans.
content.Alex: I played the 'Strength' game too many times and now my arms feel like rubber.
content.George: Hmm... smoked turkey haunch? I guess this festival isn't all bad.$h
content.Evelyn: I wish Gus would include a vegetarian option. Some zucchini skewers, maybe?
content.Lewis: Well @, It's the big day... Our most important festival of the year, the 'Stardew Valley Fair'.#$b#If you'd like to participate by setting up a grange display, I've left an empty stand for you. Just let me know after you've set everything up so we can get to the judging.
content.Clint: I complain about my job sometimes, but I do take pride in my work.#$b#These are some of my finest pieces. I hope you like them.
content.Emily: You know, I would've made a pretty good clown. I think I missed my calling.
content.Penny: I won the wheel of chance ten times in a row and now the man won't let me play anymore...$s
content.Pam: Better hurry up, kid... Before ol' Pam here fishes every last lunker out of the tent! Hehe.$h
content.Haley: Have you been to the fortune teller? She set up her stand in the graveyard.#$e#I already saw her... she told me something... interesting. *giggle*$h
content.Jodi: He doesn't look very happy... I guess Mayor Lewis had to cut costs with a budget clown this year.
content.Kent: I'm waiting for this clown to start doing something funny.#$e#Pretty disappointing.
content.Sam: Hey @. Having a good time?#$e#The slingshot tent is pretty fun, and if you get good at it you can really rack up the star tokens.
content.Leah: I really admire Robin's carpentry skills. I use a lot of the same techniques in my own line of work.
content.Shane: All these animals are friendly and love to get massaged.
content.Marnie: I tried my best, but my display is pretty weak compared to Pierre's.$s#$e#Well, maybe the judges will give me bonus points for the massive cheese wheel.
content.Elliott: I'm trying to get Gus to tell me his sauce recipe, but he won't budge.
content.Gus: Eat as much as you like! It's all free today... compliments of Mayor Lewis.$h#$e#Oh! Make sure to dribble some of my secret sauce on there.
content.Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
content.Wizard: Welwick and I have known each other for a long time... she is a remarkable diviner, and a good friend.#$e#...#$e#That clown... I know him from somewhere.#$e#Was it the school of illusion? Or maybe the Carnival of Secrets? Hmm...
content.Harvey: And just a few steps over there, Gus is grilling up a batch of pork ribs... Yikes.$s#$e#I've got some soul-searching to do...$11
content.Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
content.Jas: Ow! A hen pecked my little finger!$u
content.Marlon: Clint's blades get sharper every year.#$e#So do his prices...
content.Willy: Are you setting up a grange display, @? It's your chance to show off all the good produce from %farm!
content.Leo: Haha! I've never seen anything like this before...$h
